خدمة عملاء علي أعلي مستوي: Customer service at the highest level
تضم عيادات بيوتي اند كير نخبة من أفضل ال: Beauty and Care clinics include a selection of the best doctors in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in all its various departments and rely on the use of advanced medical technologies by expert doctors specializing in micro-specialties in plastic surgery, burns, dermatology, laser, ear, nose and throat, ophthalmology, obstetrics and gynecology to provide advanced services of high quality following the World Health Organization and the Ministry of Health and international standards. Where all plastic surgery services are provided, including liposuction, tummy tuck, breast augmentation and reduction, gynecomastia, body sculpting and weight loss. All dermatology services and treatments, cosmetic injection services, laser hair removal services, hair loss treatments, skin tightening, and cellulite treatment are provided. Ear, nose and throat diseases, ear bleeding, nasal obstruction and headache are treated. Eye diseases, eye infections, immunity, retinal diseases, diabetes, treatment of gynecological diseases, gynecological tumors, urinary tract, delayed pregnancy, female enuresis, natural deliveries and cesarean section are treated. Our goal is always to grow and expand our services to include all your needs, in line with our ambition and passion to provide complete and exceptional medical care.
